column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Can't say enough about Bavette's.  I don't typically like fancy steakhouses because  I can make a pretty good steak myself
column2: but the sides at this place are worth the $$$$ meal.  I went with the Prime Rib which was cooked right on the screws.  For sides
column5: THICK BACON SLICES (we had as an app not a side)
column6: and something else I can't remember.
